references.paper_title: Learning multiple layers of features from tiny images
references.reason: This paper introduces the CIFAR-10 dataset, a benchmark dataset heavily used in the paper's experiments.

references.paper_title: ImageNet Classification with Deep Convolutional Neural Networks
references.reason: This foundational paper on deep convolutional neural networks is referenced as the starting point for CNNs.

references.paper_title: Adam: A method for stochastic optimization
references.reason: The Adam optimizer, crucial for training the models in this paper, is introduced and described here.

references.paper_title: Xnor-net: Imagenet classification using binary convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces XNOR-Net, a binary neural network used as a performance baseline and comparison in this paper.
This paper, heavily cited, introduces the core concept of differentiable logic gate networks that this paper extends upon.
